LanguageData.Bullet_SentryTurret.label: sentry shell
LanguageData.Gun_SentryTurret.label: sentry cannon
LanguageData.Gun_SentryTurret.description: A self-loading large-bore cannon designed to attach to a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_SentryTurret.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: sentry cannon
LanguageData.Turret_Sentry.label: security sentry turret
LanguageData.Turret_Sentry.description: A heavy automatic turret. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges, but its barrel must be refurbished after use. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
